attributes.action: Recover the full cost of the Fatwah Protection we taxpayers provided to keep Salman Rushdie alive long enough for him to make his millions..
attributes.additional_details: Salmon Rushdie has made millions from books written while we taxpayers were paying for his round the clock police protection from a Fatwah placed upon him by the Islamic Authorities.  It is an abomination that he is allowed to benefit from his activities and rake in millions while the people who paid to keep him alive are suffering austerity conditions.  He has the money and so he should repay us OR HE SHOULD LEAVE THE COUNTRY AND TAKE HIS CHANCES OUT IN THE REAL WORLD.
